translations: n.家长主义者；实行家长制统治的人
adj.家长作风的；家长式统治的

sentences.sentence: Primo de Rivera himself was a benevolent and sincere paternalist.
sentences.translation: 普里莫·德里韦拉本人是个仁慈而真诚的家长式人物。

sentences.sentence: The whole place was the romantic vision of the paternalist local squire.
sentences.translation: 这整个地方就是那位家长式乡绅的浪漫想象。 。
